assignments.focus: Colorblind mode settings panel. Shows dropdown/radio selector for 8 colorblind types (Protanopia, Protanomaly, Deuteranopia, Deuteranomaly, Tritanopia, Tritanomaly, Achromatopsia, Achromatomaly) plus high-contrast mode. Each type has clear description. Toggle for pattern overlays. Persistence indicator.

Simulation mode and status indicator examples. Shows before/after comparison of UI elements (success/error/warning/info states) with colorblind adjustments applied. Pattern overlay examples. Theme compatibility demonstration (light/dark with colorblind mode).
